hero.caption: BECAUSE IF THE COVER DOES NOT IMPRESS YOU WHAT ELSE CAN?
hero.currentRole: Currently, I'm a Software Engineer at
hero.description: A self-taught UI/UX designer, functioning in the industry for 3+ years now. I make meaningful and delightful digital products that create an equilibrium between user needs and business goals.
hero.aiTools: I leverage AI development tools to enhance productivity and code quality
hero.aiToolsDescription: Proficient in using Cursor, Windsurf, and GitHub Copilot to accelerate development workflows and deliver high-quality solutions.

portalCraft.title: E-commerce Applications
portalCraft.description: Developed multiple e-commerce applications with Lazada integration, focusing on group buying features and seamless shopping experiences. Built with ReactJS and Node.js support.

details.point1: Developed Co-bee e-commerce app with Lazada integration for seamless product synchronization and order management.
details.point2: Built Co-hoot e-commerce platform with advanced shopping features and Lazada marketplace connectivity.
details.point3: Implemented Buy Together feature for group purchasing, enabling users to join groups and share deals on Co-bee platform.
details.point4: Utilized ReactJS for frontend development with focus on performance and user experience.
details.point5: Provided Node.js support for backend integration and API development.
details.point6: Worked remotely in a distributed team environment, ensuring effective communication and collaboration.

edmAgent.title: EDM Agent
edmAgent.description: A comprehensive system for managing agent profile movements and lifecycles. Handles profile registration and full lifecycle management including code generation, promotion, demotion, withdrawal, and suspension. Built with high-performance and security in mind.

details.point1: Built a comprehensive system for managing agent movement and lifecycles, ensuring accurate tracking of status changes.
details.point2: Secured the application with JWT authentication and granular permission management to ensure data integrity.
details.point3: Implemented bulk upload functionality to process large volumes of agent data efficiently.
details.point4: Developed a robust email service with dynamic template support for automated system notifications.
details.point5: Utilized Docker for containerization, ensuring consistent deployment across development and production environments.
details.point6: Integrated Spring Boot, Angular, Kafka, MSSQL Stored Procedures, and Oracle (for system permission page, action, user, role) to deliver high performance and reliability.

workExperience.title: Work Experience
workExperience.bottomText: Started my developer journey in 2022, with 3 years of remote frontend development specializing in ReactJS. Recently joined as a full-stack developer with Java backend, working onsite to expand my expertise across the entire stack.
workExperience.address: 43-45 Tú Xương, Võ Thị Sáu Ward, District 3, Ho Chi Minh City 700000
